pullrequest.title: [issue #2487] Fix manipulating links in the model editor

content.raw: Nice find, but I think that only explains half the story. According to the comments in the code, links in the model editor should be skipping that condition anyway. So I think that something else changed the depth of links in the model editor, and the change you linked just exposed the issue.
content.html: Nice find, but I think that only explains half the story. According to the comments in the code, links in the model editor should be skipping that condition anyway. So I think that something else changed the depth of links in the model editor, and the change you linked just exposed the issue.
